explanation: The stage direction 'AIR. Les filles de Montpellier.' starts with 'AIR', which is indicative of a music stage direction. The content following 'AIR' is the name of the tune, in this case, 'Les filles de Montpellier'. This fits the definition of Category 8: 'Music description. Not used when the stage direction describes the character singing. Often starts with the word 'AIR' or 'Air'.'
